extendedInfo.description: FPse for Android is the fastest and most compatible PSone  emulator for handheld devices.(also known as PSX or Playstation 1)More than 200.000 active users and rated up to 4,5 stars on google play! FPse is able to render PSone games in high resolution by using OpenGL which gives outstanding graphics!Take a look to the Official Documentation to understand requirements and how it works:http://www.fpsece.net/faq.htmlCreate an ISO image from your favorite games and enjoy playing them on your Android phone.FPse features the following:-Impressive UI which scan and draw covers games automatically!-High performance-High compatibility-High sound quality-Real-time save states-Audio track emulation (using .cue files)-Force-feedback-Dynamically loadable Overlay Pads-Guncon emulation-Analog Stick emulation-Compatible with G-Sensor, Touchscreen and Hardware keys-Supports .img, .iso, .bin, .cue, .nrg , .mdf and .Z disc image formats-Full Support for IcontrolPAD, BGP100,Zeemote (via Bluez IME)- Full native support for Xbox 360 pads, PS3 Sixasis pads and MOGA controllers!!-OpenGL support via external plugin!-Experimental LAN multi Players mode using two Android devices! Play with two players mode with games that wasn't made for that! IE: Tekken3!-Exclusive automatic cheats search engine.And much more impressive features!From the new UI you can load and share covers and even compress games...Searching for tutorial? take a look here:http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOYgJXtdk3G9PMkJYnm2ybONIi5-i_Iu5Please visit Forum if you have any question.PSX , PSone, PlayStationÂ© are trademarks or registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. All rights reserved.

reviews.title: Please fix open-gl for sg4 I9505!! Fps is under 40
reviews.comment: This emulator was the king on my sg2 with open-gl enabled. But having open-gl enabled on the sg4, would give with terrible frame-rate. Please fix this as the games does not look as good with software emulation!! Thank You!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Drop in performance!!!! GS III
reviews.comment: The constant updates are nice but they break other things. All games have become slow and run inconsistently. Tekken 3 ran good, now it stutters and Street Fighter EX+ Alpha chuggs a lot. Please fix the graphic issues. Samsung Galaxy S III US Sprint Variant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app that I would give 5 stars, except that it won\'t save the buttons that I assign on my (wired) PS3 controller.
reviews.author: Sam Dixon

reviews.title: Works with most games...
reviews.comment: Unfortunately, this emulator makes it impossible to get past the infamous Disc 2 balcony glitch in Final Fantasy VIII.
reviews.author: Ruari Hutchison

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: I really love this up,it works even with ipega controler so It realy great console now :)
reviews.author: Filip Uhrecky

reviews.title: Well
reviews.comment: Has improved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing emulator
reviews.comment: I love everything about this emulator nothing like reliving my childhood memories it feels good to play my games on my android thank for this amazing app team keep it up =D
reviews.author: Isaiah Grimes

reviews.title: What happened to this wonderful app?
reviews.comment: I bought this sometime in around december and its worked great for me i played it nonstop but then sometime a few weeks ago there was an update and ever since then its crashed every time i try to open it.. Im very disapointed that i can no longer use this app because it use to be so great
reviews.author: Isaac Maki

reviews.title: Not loading
reviews.comment: Used to be amazing, but when I reinstalled on my replacement Xperia z it now loads up then crashes when I try to start playing. Tried uninstalling and using different roms nothing seems to make any difference
reviews.author: Rob Taylor

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: Running better now than it was before, still annoyed by the need to download plug ins everytime i open the app however.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best there is
reviews.comment: Best emulator there is in town. They keep it updated and running well... they even added support for the Xperia play touch pad analog sticks! Even works great on my off-brand cheap tablet. Well worth the money, would recommend to anyone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best app ever!
reviews.comment: I grew up in the 90\'s and the first major game console I played was PlayStation 1. I have often wanted to relive my childhood and play these old favorites like crash team racing, tekken 3 and medievil on a handheld device using a PlayStation controller (not the PSP). My prayers have been answered and now I can.  Not only does it play 99% of games I\'ve tried on it, it can load cheats from things like gameshark too and bust your game open. Just get it. Absolutely FLAWLESS!
reviews.author: Gizmo Snozzers

reviews.title: Its works well but could be better.
reviews.comment: Sick app. Easy to use. You guys update more than anything. Beast mode. However, I would like my settings to autosave better and no crash when backing out of video settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tekken 3 lags so much !
reviews.comment: I really love this app because for one it has so many skins you can choose and so many more cheats than epsxe on tekken 3.    It is better than epsxe because of those two but epsxe is also good because it has so much better fps it almost never goes lower than 57 fps and on the other hand fpse goes all the way to 33 fps sometimes !   Please fix I dont want to rate one star because its a good app in some ways
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No games
reviews.comment: I haven\'t been able to play any games. I\'ve tried downloading different kinds of ROMS none have work can someone help? Can I get a refund instead
reviews.author: Walter Herrarte

reviews.title: Remembering old times :)
reviews.comment: Thanks to this app, I can now go back in time and play my favorite games on more time. Thanks for making it easy to play with the nvidia shield.
reviews.author: Javier Benites

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Faster run game final fantasy vii.
reviews.author: Safiee Abu

reviews.title: Seen better days.
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this emulator on two phones over a few years.   For most of that time this has been an amazing emulator.  However there are several quirks to learn about it.  Additionally, the developers update it constantly.  This is normally a good thing, but it occasionally leaves game saves, save states,  or the games themselves broken and unplayable.  Looking forward to it working again with a future update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Absolutely flawless. Using mine with the moga controller :)
reviews.author: Ryan White

reviews.title: Great but a PITA
reviews.comment: Every time I update I lose my quick saves, and with MGS the only way I can save is by using quick saves because it doesn\'t let me overwrite my save in game so I have to save on a new slot until I\'m out of room and forced to quicksave.
reviews.author: Jay M
